lead_paragraph: YABLON--Leonard H. It is with great sadness that we announce the unexpected passing of Leonard H. Yablon, 87, of Irvington, NY, beloved husband of Dr. Pamela Gallin Yablon, adored father, grandfather and great- grandfather. Graduate of Baruch College and LIU who became CFO of Forbes, Inc. and Chairman of Forbes Family Holding Company. He was a highly intelligent, unique, kind, thoughtful and extraordinary man who loved his family, swimming, tennis, dogs and business. He will be sorely missed by the many who enjoyed his company, constant smile and energy. A private family funeral will be held on Sunday, June 26th. Donations in Lenny's honor may be made to the Atalef Foundation (Israeli Navy Seals). 1/3
